ui.dialogs.zha_device_info.services.reco: Преконфигурирайте ZHA устройство (оздравяване на устройство). Използвайте това, ако имате проблеми с устройството. Ако въпросното устройство е захранвано с батерии, моля, уверете се, че е будно и приема команди, когато използвате тази услуга.
ui.dialogs.zha_device_info.services.upda: Задайте персонализирано име за това устройство в регистъра на устройствата.
ui.dialogs.zha_device_info.services.remo: Премахване на устройство от Zigbee мрежата.

ui.panel.lovelace.cards.empty_state.no_d: Тази страница ви позволява да контролирате устройствата си, но изглежда, че все още нямате настроени устройства. Отидете на страницата за интеграции, за да започнете.
ui.panel.lovelace.cards.safe-mode.descri: Home Assistant ran into trouble while loading your configuration and is now running in safe mode. Take a look at the error log to see what went wrong.
ui.panel.lovelace.cards.starting.descrip: Home Assistant is starting, please wait...
ui.panel.lovelace.unused_entities.title: Unused entities
ui.panel.lovelace.unused_entities.availa: These are the entities that you have available, but are not in your Lovelace UI yet.
ui.panel.lovelace.unused_entities.select: Select the entities you want to add to a card and then click the add card button.

ui.panel.lovelace.editor.raw_editor.reso: Resources should no longer be added to the Lovelace configuration but can be added in the Lovelace config panel.
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.edit_lovelace.h: Заглавие на вашия Lovelace потребителски интерфейс
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.edit_lovelace.e: Това заглавие се показва над всичките ви изгледи в Lovelace
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.edit_view.visib: Изберете кои потребители да виждат този изглед в навигацията
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.edit_badges.pan: These badges will not be displayed because this view is in "Panel Mode".

Which card would you like to add to your {name} view?
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.edit_card.confi: Сигурни ли сте, че искате да отмените?
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.move_card.heade: Choose a view to move the card to
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.suggest_card.he: We created a suggestion for you
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.save_config.hea: Поемете контрол над потребителския интерфейс на Lovelace
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.save_config.par: По подразбиране Home Assistant поддържа потребителския интерфейс, като го актуализира, когато нови обекти или компоненти на Lovelace станат достъпни. Ако поемете контрол, ние вече няма да правим автоматично промени вместо вас.
Наистина ли искате да поемете управлението на потребителския интерфейс?
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.save_config.yam: Използвате YAML режим за това табло, което означава, че не можете да промените вашата Lovelace конфигурация от потребителския интерфейс. Ако искате да управлявате това табло от потребителския интерфейс, премахнете „mode: yaml“ от вашата Lovelace конфигурация в „configuration.yaml.“.
To take control in YAML mode, create a YAML file with the name you specified in your config for this dashboard, or the default 'ui-lovelace.yaml'.
To help you start here is the current config of this dashboard:
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.migrate.para_no: Този елемент няма идентификатор. Моля, добавете идентификатор към този елемент в "ui-lovelace.yaml".
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.migrate.para_mi: Home Assistant може автоматично да добави идентификатори към всичките ви карти и изгледи, като натиска бутона "Мигриране на конфигурация".
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.action-editor.e: Service data can only be entered in the code editor
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.card.alarm-pane: The Alarm Panel card allows you to Arm and Disarm your alarm control panel integrations.
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.card.calendar.d: The Calendar card displays a calendar including day, week and list views
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.card.conditiona: The Conditional card displays another card based on entity states.
The card will be shown when ALL conditions below are fulfilled.
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.card.entities.d: The Entities card is the most common type of card. It groups items together into lists.
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.card.entities.e: View the details of this row by clicking the edit button
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.card.entity.des: The Entity card gives you a quick overview of your entity’s state.
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.card.button.des: The Button card allows you to add buttons to perform tasks.
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.card.button.def: The default action depends on the entity's capabilities, it will either be toggled or the more info will be shown.
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.card.entity-fil: The Entity Filter card allows you to define a list of entities that you want to track only when in a certain state.
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.card.gauge.name: Gauge
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.card.gauge.desc: The Gauge card is a basic card that allows visually seeing sensor data.
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.card.glance.des: The Glance card is useful to group multiple sensors in a compact overview.
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.card.grid.name: Grid
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.card.grid.descr: The Grid card allows you to show multiple cards in a grid.
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.card.logbook.de: The Logbook card shows a list of events for entities.
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.card.history-gr: The History Graph card allows you to display a graph for each of the entities listed.
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.card.horizontal: The Horizontal Stack card allows you to stack together multiple cards, so they always sit next to each other in the space of one column.
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.card.humidifier: The Humidifier card gives control of your humidifier entity. Allowing you to change the humidity and mode of the entity.
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.card.iframe.des: The Webpage card allows you to embed your favorite webpage right into Home Assistant.
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.card.light.name: Light
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.card.light.desc: The Light card allows you to change the brightness of the light.
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.card.generic.ma: Need to add a custom card or just want to manually write the yaml?
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.card.generic.st: Да се оцветят ли иконите спрямо състоянието?
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.card.map.name: Map
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.card.map.descri: The Map card that allows you to display entities on a map.
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.card.markdown.d: The Markdown card is used to render Markdown.
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.card.media-cont: The Media Control card is used to display media player entities on an interface with easy to use controls.
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.card.picture.de: The Picture card allows you to set an image to use for navigation to various paths in your interface or to call a service.
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.card.picture-el: The Picture Elements card is one of the most versatile types of cards. The cards allow you to position icons or text and even services! On an image based on coordinates.
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.card.picture-en: The Picture Entity card displays an entity in the form of an image. Instead of images from URL, it can also show the picture of camera entities.
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.card.picture-gl: The Picture Glance card shows an image and corresponding entity states as an icon. The entities on the right side allow toggle actions, others show the more information dialog.
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.card.plant-stat: The Plant Status card is for all the lovely botanists out there.
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.card.sensor.des: The Sensor card gives you a quick overview of your sensors state with an optional graph to visualize change over time.
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.card.shopping-l: The Shopping List card allows you to add, edit, check-off, and clear items from your shopping list.
This card requires the `shopping_list` integration to be set up.
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.card.thermostat: The Thermostat card gives control of your climate entity. Allowing you to change the temperature and mode of the entity.
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.card.vertical-s: The Vertical Stack card allows you to group multiple cards so they always sit in the same column.
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.card.weather-fo: The Weather Forecast card displays the weather. Very useful to include on interfaces that people display on the wall.
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.view.panel_mode: This renders the first card at full width. Other cards in this view as well as badges will not be rendered.
Този изглед съдържа повече от една карта, но изгледът на панел може да показва само 1 карта.
ui.panel.lovelace.warning.starting: Home Assistant is starting, not everything may be available yet
ui.panel.lovelace.changed_toast.message: Конфигурацията на Lovelace бе актуализирана, искате ли да опресните?
ui.panel.custom.external_panel.question_: Do you trust the external panel {name} at {link}?
ui.panel.custom.external_panel.complete_: It will have access to all data in Home Assistant.
ui.panel.custom.external_panel.hide_mess: Check docs for the panel_custom component to hide this message
